participant_1.background:
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
I'm afraid my car will break down while I'm out fishing.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.
I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day.
I collect yarn from different places to use in my crochet projects.

participant_2.background:
Last year, I painted a portrait of my two small dogs.
i like to cook breakfast on sundays.
i live in a house.
I am a dancer and my spouse is a weather forecaster.
i have 4 daughters.

content.text: Hi, I'm good! I just finished painting a portrait of my two small dogs.
Oh wow, that's so cool! What kind of dog is it?
I love chihuahuas! I have a chihuahua mix named Wonwon.
That's a cute name! I love cuddles with my dogs on rainy days.
Me too! I usually cuddle up on the couch with a good book and my dog.
That sounds like a relaxing way to spend a rainy day.
What do you like to do on rainy days?
I like to cook breakfast on Sundays. It's my favorite meal of the week.
That's a great way to start the day! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making french toast. It's so delicious and easy to make.
Yum, that sounds delicious! I love french toast!
We should have a french toast cook-off sometime!
That would be fun! I'm sure our dogs would love it too.
